meanings.definition: A group of carnivorous dinosaurs characterized by their two-legged stance and sharp teeth.
meanings.sent1: The museum exhibit showcased the fierce theropods from the prehistoric era.
meanings.sent2: Scientists believe that theropods were some of the most fearsome predators of their time.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they pretended to be playful theropods chasing each other around the playground.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle of the classroom, the teacher ruled like a pack of theropods, keeping order with sharp commands.
meanings.sent5: The movie depicted the theropods in vivid detail, showing their hunting strategies and interactions.

meanings.definition: The study of theropods focuses on their evolution and behavior.
meanings.sent1: Researchers dedicated their careers to unraveling the mysteries of theropods.
meanings.sent2: Books on paleontology often delve into the fascinating world of theropods.
meanings.sent3: The documentary on theropods had the audience on the edge of their seats with its thrilling discoveries.
meanings.sent4: The evolution of technology can be compared to the evolution of theropods, adapting to survive in changing environments.
meanings.sent5: Students were captivated by the professor's lecture on theropods, eager to learn more about these ancient creatures.

meanings.definition: Paleontologists have discovered many fossils of theropods in various locations around the world.
meanings.sent1: Excited researchers unearthed a new site with a treasure trove of theropod fossils.
meanings.sent2: The museum exhibit displayed the diverse range of theropods found across continents.
meanings.sent3: The detective novel featured a thrilling plot centered around the mysterious disappearance of theropod bones.
meanings.sent4: The discovery of theropod fossils was like finding pieces of a prehistoric puzzle, slowly revealing the past.
meanings.sent5: The expedition team set out to remote lands in search of undiscovered theropod remains, braving unknown dangers.
